text:
I’m going to tell AD I love him and I have all his stuff packed up ready to go back to Kirkland. I have always told him I was proud of him for sharing
his concerns and will continue to do so.
I also would like to share what happened so he knows my explanation and that I agree with what he saw. I need to let him know I can’t see him
anymore but I love him dearly and he can always call.
I know we have plans for Dr Brown but I don’t know what they are and I think I have accepted after all these months of trying to get something,
anything in place, i just won’t see my boys again.
I’m not a victim, there is just always a reason that all this horrible nightmare won’t end. And if it’s all my fault - you, the kids, retirement, I need to
eventually accept the blame and start a new life.
Please be there for AD... I don’t want him upset but at some point I have to be honest and stop leading him on. We FaceTime every day so he can see
progress. Its super fun but It’s not right to keep that lie going. He will never trust me if I do.
Message 818 of 4024
His room is all re-packed. I finished today. It’s not a ton of stuff but it is meaningful. That is why it was here. I’ll be sure Elsa brings it all back so don’t
want him to think I just took it and had no plans to return.
Sent:01/26/2024 at 12:52 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/26/2024 at 01:36 PM)
Subject:Re: We Can Do This!!!  <<Outstanding Issues Fork>>
Message 819 of 4024
Sorry. Last thing (I hope) I put the new basketball goal and ping pong table on Craigslist. If you want to send pics of the peloton or other things, I can
mange all at once.
Or we can wait till it gets here if that ever happens in our new world. For that matter I guess the ping pong table could get moved to Kirkland too. It’s
nice but only 90% together.
I’m out. It’s been a hard day. Have a safe trip. I’m trying to remove you as my emergency contact too.
Sent:01/26/2024 at 01:04 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/26/2024 at 01:36 PM)
Subject:Re: We Can Do This!!!  <<Outstanding Issues Fork>>
Message 820 of 4024
My hope was Dr. Brown could help navigate this situation but you have decided the outcome.
I didn’t create this situation and can’t control what you communicate to him.
Sent:01/26/2024 at 01:51 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/26/2024 at 01:52 PM)
Subject:Re: We Can Do This!!!  <<Outstanding Issues Fork>>
